title: The Starving Wolf
text: A lone wolf blocks your path. It looks more afraid than angry, but it's baring its teeth.

success.text: You yell loudly. It scampers off.

fail.text: It lunges! You take a scratch before kicking it away.

success.text: A brutal fight, but you eat well tonight.

fail.text: It was faster than you. You are badly bitten.

success.text: It eats the food and leaves you alone.

fail.text: It eats the food... and still wants to bite you.
It nipped your heels as you fled.

success.text: The bright light terrifies the beast.
